activities: Q-Bridge is a marketing firm that specializes in the design, production, execution and management of digital direct-response campaigns on behalf of its customers. As such, we are required to receive data from clients, including those in Europe, from their CRM systems and other data sources. We perform data hygiene and cleansing on this data, merge and pure against other data sources, and verify email addresses to create and manage consolidated outbound marketing databases. We use these databases to conduct digital marketing campaigns. We also revert the final data back to clients so that they may update their internal data. All data, transmitted both to and from clients, is transferred via secure FTP
